description: The Ronah family`s business empire, established in U.C. 0055. Its subdivisions include the Buch Junk salvage company, the mobile suit manufacturer http://anidb.net/ch1740 [Buch Aerodynamics], and a vocational training school which later provides the basis for the private army known as the http://anidb.net/ch1738 [Crossbone Vanguard].
name: Buch Concern
